description:
Playing as the Off Road Cargo Heavy Trailer Truck Simulator 3D driving is a hard tasks especially transporting cargo, army relief and other military vehicles on Off Road steep paths. Be an extreme offroad hill driver to deliver cargo to army camps. Driver mega army off road transport trucks on rugged terrains and enjoy the thrill of hill climb off road drive
load the army jeeps, trucks, tanks on trailer and drive the army truck trailer be carefully because army truck trailer is very heavy and big..
Be an Off Road Cargo Heavy Trailer Truck Simulator 3D for ultimate army cargo truck transport in one of the best army transport games with more than just a off road army truck driving simulator. off road army truck Driving game is about to go out and transport the army vehicles or transportation to their destination. Complete the mission objective to complete the level. Stay awake! These army base environments have very dangerous roads, mountains and check points. So drive carefully. You’re driving skills around these difficult areas by driving off road army trucks. Track will be difficult or long after each level of game. This test of your skills of acceleration, steering and brakes if you complete this game then you will be a good off road army truck driver. Now complete missions Survive through different mission and complete the tasks to unlock the next missions. Your mission is to transport heavy army cargo, vehicles and warheads in war field extreme Army truck hill driving.


Off Road Cargo Heavy Trailer Truck Simulator 3D Features

- Real Experience Off Road Army Truck Driving
- Smooth Steering & Brakes
-Amazing 3D Graphics & Off Road Environment
- Transporting Relief, Armory Boxes, 4x4 Army Jeeps and tanks, army off road vehicles and much more
